marklogic.body:
Having spent my years in jr. high and sr. high in a boxing club, I can attest that broken noses don't Always show much physical damage. Often, some immediate minor Bleeding and minor swelling in the next day or two. They also can Bleed profusely, and lead to major swelling and black eyes. So, nothing is proved by the video.
Having said that, I can imagine if a "dildo" shaped,XXX rated, huge proboscis like Maher's was broken, that blood would be all over the place.Â
Maher: "We don't need no 'steeenkin' trial."Â
